org.numenta.nupic.network.sensor

Class SensorParams

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.numenta.nupic.util.Tuple
      • org.numenta.nupic.util.NamedTuple
        • org.numenta.nupic.network.sensor.SensorParams

  • public class SensorParams
extends NamedTuple

    Implementation of named parameter tuples that is tightly keyed to only known keys in order to assist with proper formation and auto creation within a Network.

    To retrieve a Keys.Args from this SensorParams for the purpose of construction follow this pattern for usage: 

      Object[] n = { "rec-center-hourly", ResourceLocator.locate("rec-center-hourly") };
    SensorParams parms = SensorParams.create(Keys::uri, n); // May be (Keys::path, Keys::obs) also

    Author:
    David Ray

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SensorParams.Keys
      Convenience class to use as handle way to specify an expected String array of key values for each of the 3 known input configuration types.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SensorParams

        private SensorParams(java.util.function.Supplier<SensorParams.Keys.Args> keySet,
                     java.lang.Object... values)
        Takes a String array of keys (via Supplier.get() and a varargs array of their values, creating key/value pairs. In this case, the keys are all predetermined to be one of the SensorParams.Keys.Args types which specify the keys which are to be used.
        Parameters:
        keySet - a Supplier yielding a particular set of String keys
        values - the values correlated with the specified keys.

      • SensorParams
